attributes.action: Stop Nick Clegg from attending to receive EU Nobel Peace Prize.
attributes.additional_details: If there is only one individual in the UK who is least representative of the people of this land it is Nick Clegg.  He SHOULD NOT be allowed to represent the people of this land,  he has proved through his activities as Deputy Prime Minister  and leader of a minority party that is destined for the dustbin at the next general election that he has no honour; he has no integrity; he has no probity.  The majority of the people of this land do, and he is not representative of us.
